member.name: T:Tridion.ExternalContentLibrary.V1.SessionFactory
member.summary: Use SessionFactory to create an based on a TCM Session. SessionFactory is the starting point for using External Content Library in templating and event handlers.

member.name: M:Tridion.ExternalContentLibrary.V1.SessionFactory.CreateEclSession(Tridion.ContentManager.Session)
member.summary: Creates an based on the specified TCM Session.
member.param: A TCM Session to use as a base for the IEclSession created.
member.returns: An based on the specified TCM Session.
member.remarks: Note that is not automatically disposed when the TCM Session is disposed. Call explicitly when the session is no longer needed, otherwise both the Content Manager Server (Tridion) and the external system may run out of resources, for example memory and database connections.

member.name: M:Tridion.ExternalContentLibrary.V1.SessionFactory.CreateEclSession(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an for a specific user.
member.param: The username to use when creating the TCM Session.
member.remarks: The identity under which the process is running must be configured as a Tridion impersonation user, unless the username match the username of the identity the process is running under and the username identifies a valid Tridion User.
